#Installing Wordpress using Wordpress Installer

= Introduction =

Download and extract the zip file and upload it to the domain directory where you want to install the wordpress.

= Details =

*Go to the address bar and type the full path to the file " fairyhost-wp-installer.php" and hit enter.

*You will be prompted to enter database information

*After filling up the details, submit the form. If your details are incorrect, you will see the error page.

*Instead you will be redirected to the Wordpress Installation and asked to enter your site information.

*Provide the information of Site title, username and password and submit the form. You will get a success message.

*Login to your wordpress admin are using the password and username you previously set to see whether you have installed the latest version of wordpress or not.
